code: import{useLocation,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import classes from"../components/quizzes/QuizItem.module.css";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ResultPage(){var navigate=useNavigate();var location=useLocation();var score=location.state.score;var questions=location.state.questions;var key=[];function makeid(length){var result="";var characters="ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789";var charactersLength=characters.length;for(var i=0;i<length;i++){result+=characters.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random()*charactersLength));}return result;}for(var k=0;k<questions.length;k++){var question=questions[k];if(question.hasOwnProperty("options")){if(question.type==="Multiple Choice"){var an="";for(var i=0;i<question.options.length;i++){var option=question.options[i];if(option.correct){an=option.text;}}key.push(an);}else{var ans="";for(var j=0;j<question.options.length;j++){if(j===0){ans=question.options[j].text;}else{ans=ans+", "+question.options[j].text;}}key.push(ans);}}else{key.push("");}}function returnHandler(){navigate("/");}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{textAlign:"center"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{children:["Score: ",score," out of ",questions.length]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Answer Key:"}),questions.map(function(question){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["Question ",question.number,": ",question.ask]},makeid(10)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["Answer(s): ",key[question.number-1]]},makeid(10)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{},makeid(10))]},makeid(10));}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:classes.actions,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:returnHandler,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Back to main page"})})})]});}export default ResultPage;
